title: Fragment With Factory Stamp, ca. 1830
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block-printed on plain weave fabric; block registration marks visible
inscribed: '134 OXFORD St MILES & EDWARDS" within simple rectangular frame within elaborate encadrement in red. The start of a mark in black is visible at bottom edge. Handwritten in ink, "28 1/2" yds.
dimensions:
Warp: 26.5 cm (10 1/2 in.). Weft: 65.5cm (25 3/4in.) Both selvedges present.
Pattern: Minimum unit of repeat: Height: 9cm (3 1/2in.). Width: 7.5cm (2 3/4in.).
description: Factory mark at one end. Pattern of scattered dianthus (pinks) in three reds and two green on natural.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment With Factory Stamp, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Medium: cotton
Technique: block-printed on plain weave fabric; block registration marks visible. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-24.
